title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the protection of Sir George Chudleigh, Sir John Northcott, Sir Samuel Rolle, and Sir Nicholas Martyn, in the countie of Devon, who have lately beene proclaimed traytors by his Majestie.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Decemb. 21. London printed for Iohn Wright in the Old-Bayly,
